subject: Boxing
organizations: International Boxing Federation and World Boxing Organization
lead_paragraph: The world heavyweight champion Wladimir Klitschko withdrew from the defense of his International Boxing Federation and World Boxing Organization titles after failing to recover from a torn abdominal muscle.
snippet: The world heavyweight champion Wladimir Klitschko withdrew from the defense of his International Boxing Federation and World Boxing Organization titles after failing to recover from a torn abdominal muscle.
